  • Class
    Description
    Configuration
    This class is used to load the configuration file.
    ControllerStatusToFile
    This class represents the controller status to file, which contains information about the current game ID, already used player IDs, and a list of credentials.
    GameStatusToFile
    This class represents the game status to be saved to a file.
    GameStatusToSend
    This class represents the status of the game to be sent to clients.
    IpConfig
    The IpConfig class represents the IP configuration of the client and the server.
    Message
    This class represents a message that is sent between the server and clients during communication.
    MessageClassEnum
    An enumeration representing the message class types.
    MessageDispatcher
    The MessageDispatcher class handles the communication between the server and the client.
    PlayerStatusToFile
    This class represents the status of a player to be saved to a file.
    ProxyDataInputStream
    The ProxyDataInputStream class is used to read UTF-encoded strings from a message dispatcher based on the message class.
    ProxyDataOutputStream
    The ProxyDataOutputStream class is responsible for writing data to an output stream using a message dispatcher.
    Utils
    Represents a collection of utility functions.
